message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and valuable item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $150.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $165. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $165 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to go up to $155. Can you consider that?
I understand your willingness to compromise, Bob! I'm willing to make another adjustment. I can offer the product to you for $160. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $160 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $155, but I'm not willing to go any higher. Can you meet me at $155?
I understand your final offer, Bob! I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I can offer the product to you for $157.50. What do you think?
